section.title: AddTitleStyle
section.para:
Adds a title style to the title-bar. state can be "", "", "" or "", or "" (the same as both "ActiveUp" and "ActiveDown") or "" (the same as both "InactiveUp" and "InactiveDown") or any of these 6 with "Toggled" prepended. If state is omitted, then the style is added to every state. If the style and flags are enclosed in parentheses, then multiple state definitions can be placed on a single line. This command is quite similar to the
command.

Title-bars are drawn in the order of definition, beginning with the most recent , followed by those added with AddTitleStyle. To clear the title style stack, change style flags, or for the descriptions of available styles and flags, see the and
commands.
